participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and easy-going, with a passion for teaching and a love for nature.
participant_1.background: I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music. I give lessons on string instruments. I don't want to talk about my parents. I read horror novels in secret so my parents don't worry about me. My favorite vacation was when my wife and I went to the Galapagos Islands.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, with a love for art and a bright, optimistic outlook on life.
participant_2.background: I cherish my sketch book more than anything. I am also a full-time student studying radiology at local college. I work in commercials. Cher from Clueless is my idea of perfection. I am of average weight.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello! How are you doing today?
Pretty good! I just got back from a trip to the Galapagos Islands.
Oh my gosh, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go there!
It was incredible! I saw so many amazing animals, like giant tortoises, sea lions, and blue footed boobies.
That sounds so cool! I love animals. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog named Charlie. He's a golden retriever.
I love golden retrievers! They're so cute and friendly.
Yeah, he's the best dog ever.
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a music teacher.
Oh cool! I love music. What kind of music do you teach?
I teach a variety of genres, but my favorite is country music.
That's awesome! I love country music too.
Do you play any instruments?
I play the piano and the violin.
That's awesome! I wish I could play an instrument.
It's never too late to learn!
I know, I know. Maybe I'll take some lessons sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will
